Calculating PET

Source: R/calc-pet.R
calc_pet.Rd

Calculating PET

Usage

calc_pet(data, method, id = id, ...)

Arguments

data

the data

method

method to calculate PET

id

the site identifier

...

the variable to use

Value

a data frame with the variable pet calculated

Examples

if (require(SPEI, quietly = TRUE)){
tenterfield %>%
  calc_pet(method = "thornthwaite", id = id, Tave = tavg, lat = -29.0479)
}
#> # Package SPEI (1.7) loaded [try SPEINews()].
#> # A tibble: 369 × 5
